Uses of Interface
io.axoniq.gdpr.serialization.RevisionResolver

  • Packages that use RevisionResolver 
    Package Description
    io.axoniq.gdpr.serialization
    Light-weight version of the serialization functionality in Axon Framework.
    io.axoniq.gdpr.serialization.json
    Support for serialization to JSON via Jackson.
    io.axoniq.gdpr.serialization.xml
    Support for serialization to XML via XStream.

    • Uses of RevisionResolver in io.axoniq.gdpr.serialization

      Classes in io.axoniq.gdpr.serialization that implement RevisionResolver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AnnotationRevisionResolver
      Revision Resolver implementation that checks for the presence of an @Revision annotation.
      class  FixedValueRevisionResolver
      RevisionResolver implementation that returns a fixed value as revision, regardless of the type of serialized object involved.
      class  MavenArtifactRevisionResolver
      RevisionResolver that uses Maven meta data to retrieve the application version.
      class  SerialVersionUIDRevisionResolver
      RevisionResolver implementation that returns the (String representation of the) serialVersionUID of a class.
      Constructors in io.axoniq.gdpr.serialization with parameters of type RevisionResolver 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractXStreamSerializer(Charset charset, com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream xStream, RevisionResolver revisionResolver)
      Initialize the serializer using the given charset and xStream instance.
      AbstractXStreamSerializer(Charset charset, com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream xStream, RevisionResolver revisionResolver, Converter converter)
      Initialize the serializer using the given charset, xStream instance, revisionResolver and converter.
      AbstractXStreamSerializer(com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream xStream, RevisionResolver revisionResolver)
      Initialize a generic serializer using the UTF-8 character set.
      JavaSerializer(RevisionResolver revisionResolver)
      Initialize the serializer using a SerialVersionUIDRevisionResolver.

    • Uses of RevisionResolver in io.axoniq.gdpr.serialization.json

      Methods in io.axoniq.gdpr.serialization.json that return RevisionResolver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected RevisionResolver JacksonSerializer.getRevisionResolver()
      Returns the revision resolver used by this serializer.
      Constructors in io.axoniq.gdpr.serialization.json with parameters of type RevisionResolver 
      Constructor and Description
      JacksonSerializer(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper, RevisionResolver revisionResolver)
      Initialize the serializer with the given objectMapper to serialize and parse the objects to JSON.
      JacksonSerializer(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper, RevisionResolver revisionResolver, Converter converter)
      Initialize the serializer with the given objectMapper to serialize and parse the objects to JSON.
      JacksonSerializer(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper, RevisionResolver revisionResolver, Converter converter, ClassLoader classLoader)
      Initialize the serializer with the given objectMapper to serialize and parse the objects to JSON.
      JacksonSerializer(RevisionResolver revisionResolver, Converter converter)
      Initialize the serializer using a default ObjectMapper instance, using the given revisionResolver to define revision for each object to serialize, and given converter to be used by upcasters.
